result.title: Report on outcomes of the field trials in Kifisos
result.description: This report will describe the places of the Kifisos pilot where the field trips have taken place, the methodology followed in the organization of the field trips, a structured compilation of newly generated text and imagery data relevant to these sites.

result.title: SCENT Stakeholder analysis & End-user needs and requirements
result.description: This report comprises a socio-anthropological investigation through the tree approach, starting from stakeholder identification with the method of focus group and semi-structured interviews. After the stakeholder analysis, a compilation of user needs will be documented, forming an end-user wish-list for a citizen observatory [M4].
